Detailed Description

Bus Editor is editor for Bus- and Abstraction definition.

Bus Editor inherits TabDocument so it can be opened into a tab in kactus workspace.

Definition at line 26 of file buseditor.h.

QSharedPointer< BusDefinition >  busDef,
QSharedPointer< AbstractionDefinition >  absDef = QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition>(),
bool  disableBusDef = false 
)

The constructor.

Parameters:
parent Pointer to the owner of this widget.
libHandler Pointer to the instance that manages library.
busDef Pointer to the bus definition to edit.
absDef Pointer to the abstraction definition to edit.
disableBusDef If true then the BusDefGroup is disabled so editing of bus definition is not possible.
